tasks.label: Run Backend (7080)
tasks.command: cd /d c:\Users\Valentina\Desktop\Project_Event_restructured\backend\Project_Event && mvnw.cmd -q -DskipTests clean package && java -Dapp.port=7080 -jar target\event-platform-1.0.0.jar

tasks.label: Run Frontend (Vite)
tasks.command: cd /d c:\Users\Valentina\Desktop\Project_Event_restructured\frontend && set VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:7080&& npm run dev
